Ascetic

You’ve dedicated a portion of your life to meditation, and have learned how to look beyond ordinary wants to find peace and clarity. You likely entered a life of seclusion, either on your own as a hermit or alongside a handful of like-minded individuals, and had plenty of time to master a physical or creative art.

Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom or Intelligence score increases by 1. Your Wisdom, Strength, or Dexterity score increases by 1.

Serenity. You can cast the spell Sanctuary without expending a spell slot using this feature. Whenever you do so, you can’t use this feature again until you finish a long rest. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.9A18YOFIFXKCJ5ZC]{Serenity}

Skills. Choose one from: Acrobatics, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Religion, Survival.

Tools. You gain proficiency with two of the following (you can select from the same category more than once): Herbalism kit, an artisan’s tool, a musical instrument.

Language. One of your choice.
